column1: I had a wonderful day today
I did not like that she put too much salt in my food
I was surprised to see that he had cleaned the room
It got me all worked up when he cut the queue
When we were in the restaurant
text: i was so scared that i might fall over and die

column1: i did not like the way he made me feel
i did not have the best day today
i did not like the way he looked at me
i had a wonderful day today
I couldnt believe that was there when i got home
